name: Being Simon Cowell
description:
Made by:
Niklas Gløsen
Rune Wangen

Controls:
Hold down space bar to lift arm, let go to drop arm. 

Description:
Simon Cowell is a little grumpy and need your help deciding which competitors of "Has Hamar Talent" gets sent to the finale.

Made during Valmuen Game Jam March 2019, where the theme was "One Button"
